gold_ring.name: Gold ring
gold_ring.description: A gold ring with a ruby. Someone's wedding ring.

thieves_tools.name: Thieves' tools
thieves_tools.description: Lockpicks, a small file, and other implements.

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: A wooden torch soaked in pitch.

lantern.name: Lantern
lantern.description: An oil lantern. Steadier light than a torch.

grappling_hook.name: Grappling hook
grappling_hook.description: A three-pronged iron hook for climbing.

bedroll.name: Bedroll
bedroll.description: A rolled blanket for sleeping outdoors.

rations.name: Rations
rations.description: Dried meat and hardtack. A day's worth of food.

bandages.name: Bandages
bandages.description: Clean cloth strips for binding wounds.
